item.description:
Come join us for a psychic reading party with Terry Kargas!
From 3:00- 7:00pm in Hardwick, Mass.

This party is for those who would like to receive a psychic tarot card reading from
Terry for 15 minutes for $15.

We will also be doing a pot-luck supper, and have a pagan discussion group
while others are getting their readings.

I will be doing free animal totem readings, to find your nine animals totems,
and some of our members will be doing free Reiki/ Shamballa healings/ treatments.

About Terry:

Terry Kargas is a natural witch whose psychic abilities run in both sides of her family.

Terry been reading tarot cards and studying natal charts since she was 15 years old, and has been doing psychic readings and parties professionally for over 20 years.

She worked at Some Enchanted Evening, for five years, doing psychic & tarot card readings, and educating people about herbs, stones, astrology, auras, dream interpretation, and magick, and has taught several workshops on a variety of subjects.

Terry has also been consulted by the FBI
to provide psychic information on two murder
cases in both Iowa and Florida.

She is also a channeler, and a medium, who
is able to see and speak with spirits, to help
people communicate with loved ones to resolve unsolved issues or to bring messages from beyond.

I know, that I can personally vouch for her talent, as can many of those who
she has read for at our gatherings.

(Please do NOT arrive any earlier than 3pm,
as we may not be there before than...we would rather have you be a little late, than early!)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The "Loose' Schedule of Events are
as follows:

3:00- 3:15 Meet & Greet

3:15- 3:30 Brief Group Meeting

3:30- 5:00 Discussion Group/ Appetizers
Life Death and Re-birth
What do you believe happens when you die?
Do you believe in Reincaration?
(Discussion can carry on through the rest the meet up)

5:00- 6:00

FREE Hands on Healing
FREE Animal Cards Reading (with me!)

6:00- 7:00

Homemade Baked Ziti, Sauce & Meatballs
Fresh Homemade Bread
Fresh Garden Salad

Dessert : Cheesecake

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
There will be a donation jar there if anyone would like to contribute a few dollars or even a dollar to pay for the meet-up fees, as it costs me $45 every 3 months to use the meet-up site. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
item.how_to_find_us: Directions given on the group only-
item.why: Well, first of all, Terry is the very best psychic I have ever known, & we are also having a wicca discussion, free animal card readings, & hands on healing for anyone who would like one... Also, there will be great home made food!
item.name: Psychic Reading Party
